abstract: The $650 billion Abu Dhabi Investment Authority is seeking to invest more in emerging markets to get higher returns than from its assets in Europe and the United States, a senior HSBC executive said on Sunday.
lead_paragraph: The $650 billion Abu Dhabi Investment Authority is seeking to invest more in emerging markets to get higher returns than from its assets in Europe and the United States, a senior HSBC executive said on Sunday.

headline.main: Abu Dhabi Fund Seeks to Invest in Emerging Markets
